articles.title: Nearly 3 mln Malawian children to get polio shot after rare outbreak - Reuters
articles.description: Medics will vaccinate about 2.9 million young children against polio in Malawi, the United Nations said on Thursday, after a three-year-old girl fell sick in the capital with Africa's first case of wild poliovirus in more than five years.
